Spare parts for UI work.

Method Summary
static void inflateDialog(LinearLayout layout)
          Force-inflates a dialog main linear-layout to take max available screen space even though contents might not occupy full screen size.

resetSharedPreferences

public static void resetSharedPreferences(Context context,
                                          java.lang.String stateName)
Erases all shared preferences saved for an activity.

Parameters:
context - Context of caller.
stateName - State name used for both saving and loading preferences.

replaceEditText

public static void replaceEditText(EditText view,
                                   java.lang.String newText)
Replace text in the passed EditText with a new string. This method takes into account the cursor positions to do partial replacement depending on how much text is currently selected in the field.

Parameters:
view - The EditText field to do the replacement in.
newText - The new text string to insert in the field.
